Reviews.Title: Great kit and value for the price.
Reviews.Author: c.van
Reviews.Content: Came with lots of stuff that may be useful.  Two batteries, charger, tripod and more.  Works great on my Camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1350 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1350 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement SLB10A Battery and Charger Kit + Memory Card Wallet + SDHC Card USB Reader + Deluxe Starter Kit for Samsung L200 Digital Camera and Samsung SLB-10A
